document_data.caption: A map showing the Ssan near the Mother-Of-Mists.
document_data.name: Ssan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ssan''', which was also called '''the Daughters''', was a small archipelago near the [[Mother-Of-Mists]] island on the [[Trackless Sea]].
document_data.Geography: The Ssan was located just off the coast of the northeast corner of the Mother-Of-Mists. The archipelago was also approximately {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} southwest of [[Baelrah]] on [[Suj]]'s southern coast.
document_data.Description: Several small islands composed the archipelago.
